mapper.sql: id, user_id, activity_id, minu_price, help_id, create_time, update_time, state, qr_code
mapper.insert:
insert into user_order
id,
user_id,
activity_id,
minu_price,
help_id,
create_time,
update_time,
state,
qr_code,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{minuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{helpId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update user_order
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
minu_price = #{minuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
help_id = #{helpId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, minu_price = #{minuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, help_id = #{helpId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qr_code = #{qrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uo.id,a.enterprise_id as enterpriseId,uo.minu_price as minuPrice from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id = a.id where 1=1 and uo.state=1 and uo.qr_code=#{qr_code}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =1 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =0 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =4 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}
select count(1) from user_order uo left join activity a on uo.activity_id=a.id left join user u on uo.user_id = u.id where 1=1 and uo.state =3 and a.enterprise_id=#{id}
